Class VGeometry

java.lang.Object
  terrapeer.vui.helpers.VGeometry
Direct Known Subclasses:
VObject, ZoneGeometry
public class VGeometry
extends java.lang.Object

Extendable Geometry object that contains virtual world geometry information, such as position and scale.

Title: TerraPeer

Description: P2P 3D System
